::: {#hero-heading}

Hou Hu, a member of the Communist Party of China, is from Tai'an, Shandong Province. 
He is currently pursuing a doctoral degree at Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, 
where his research focuses on bionic intelligent drive systems.
During his time at university, he was awarded the National Scholarship for Master's Degree Students and the title of Outstanding Communist Youth League Member.

## Background

- 2025-To be determined: PH.D, DNanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, China, specializing in Mechanical Engineering
- 2022-2025: Master of Engineering, Shanghai Institute of Technology, China, specializing in Mechanical Engineering
- 2017-2021: Bachelor of Engineering, Guizhou Institute of Technology, China, majoring in Mechanical Engineering.

:::
